text: Gordon Tootoosis (born October 25, 1941 â€“ July 5, 2011) was a Canadian actor, voice artist, and comedian. He was of Cree and Stoney descent. Tootoosis was a descendant of Yellow Mud Blanket, brother of the famous Cree leader Pitikwahanapiwiyin. In Open Season (2006), he voiced Sheriff Gordy. He played the same role in Boog and Elliot's Midnight Bun Run (2006). In July 2011, he died in the hospital from pneumonia, aged 69. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:First Nations people
title: Gordon Tootoosis
